original_title: De verdwenen lijnen van Marlow Moss
overview: Marlow Moss was radical, as an artist and human being. Almost a century ago she decided to leave the London upper class. She cut her hair, wore only men's clothes and changed her name from Marjorie to Marlow. In Paris, she worked with Mondriaan. The two artists inspired each other back and forth.
title: De verdwenen lijnen van Marlow Moss
